title: About me
body:
Heya! This is Mohan

🧑‍💻 *Software engineer* by profession. Strong believer in 🚀 Agile and lean software development. I'm currently living in the UK. I use this space to [share my thoughts](https://www.mohanraj.dev/blogs) on topics that I find interesting. When I'm not coding I fiddle with my 📸 Canon 1200D. Take a look at some of [my clicks](https://www.mohanraj.dev/clicks) from my recent trips within UK (😷 during COVID) and more...
